The claim was made by MSNBC host Ed Schu: 2. The claim stated that the repeal of Obamacare would take away health care coverage from 10.3 million Americans who have received coverage since October 1, 2013.
Multiple sources: including Gallup, The New England Journal of Medicine, the Commonwealth Fund, and the Urban Institute, have estimated that millions of adults gained health insurance coverage between October 2013 and June 2014.
The RAND Corp: conducted a study estimating a net gain of 9.3 million American adults with health insurance through March, with a forthcoming update to the study.
